text:
16 arrested

The police in Udhagamandalam arrested S. Ashwin (34) of Manjanakorai, and 16 others whom he had brought to attack his neighbours.

Speeding bus stopped

Citizens stopped a private bus (route number 22) heading to Town Hall near Royal Theatre here on Thursday for speeding. The police said that passengers of the bus asked the driver to stop the vehicle, but he did not. Some of the parents who had just dropped their children at a private school near the Coimbatore Medical College Hospital chased it and stopped it. The traffic police imposed a fine on the driver.
title: Crime Notes (Two Items)
